item.description: Theater:Take I93 north to exit 15 east,when I393 ends continue on US4 east to the Epsom Traffic Circle,go three quarters around the circle and go north on NH28.At the traffic light for NH107 make a right,when NH107 makes a left in town,make a right onto Depot Street and look for parking.The Pulitzer Prize and Tony Award winning play is a romantic mystery about,does a daughter inherit her fathers genius at math and his madness as well.$12.I helped build the set for this show.Steve
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside doors near box office
item.name: PLAY--PROOF
